NL: Find the total revenue generated by campaigns that were successful, defined as campaigns with an actual spent less than the budget.
Query: SELECT SUM(revenue_generated) AS total_revenue  FROM campaigns  WHERE actual_spent < budget AND campaign_status = 'successful';

NL: List the product display names and their associated supplier reference IDs for all products that are currently active.
Query: SELECT p.product_display_name, p.associated_supplier_reference_id  FROM products p  WHERE p.active_product_status = true AND p.minimum_threshold_for_restocking <= 5 AND p.percentage_discount_applied > 0;

NL: Retrieve the campaign name, start date, and end date for all email campaigns that have an open rate greater than 20%.
Query: SELECT T1.campaign_name, T1.start_date, T1.end_date  FROM campaigns T1  WHERE T1.campaign_type = 'email'  AND T1.email_open_rate > 0.2;
